reviewText: first off-this might as well have been a spiderman dvd with a bonus episode of the hulk being that theres 2 episodes of the wall crawler and only a single episode of the jade giant-oh and the advertisement flap on the inside is all spidey too!  the lone hulk episode is still fun to watch but i still wonder y they don't just release the entire season i mean, its only thirteen episodes anyway.  don't let the cover fool you the abomination is not in this at all but still a good cartoon to watch.
